description: Don't let veggies go to waste, learn how to pickle them with this recipe. Pickled veggies are delicious on burgers and charcuterie boards or with falafels.
name: Pickled Vegetables Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Place vegetables in a colander set over a bowl. Sprinkle over salt and toss to coat. Stand for 20 minutes or until vegetables soften slightly. Rinse under cold water. Drain. Place vegetables in jar, ensuring they are covered with pickling liquid. Seal jar and refrigerate overnight before using.
